content: Good stuff, folks — here’s a deeper dive on what the very structure of Star Wars tells us about how our collective intelligence is wired today. Here’s the Medium piece: What does Star Wars — The Force Awakens Tell us about Ourselves?NOTE: I Tried Hard Not to do it, but Potential Meta-Spoilers Contained Within!!medium.com And the full-on psychodynamic piece from my blog — which lays out how connected sentience creates knowledge. Note — I am a collective intelligence researcher. What does Star Wars - The Force Awakens Tell us about Ourselves?NOTE: I Tried Hard Not to do it, but Potential Meta-Spoilers Contained Within!! As I start writing this, I want to tell…empathy.guru Chuck
